page.title: 05UNEPLOYMENT IN THE VALLEYS
page.content:
There is of course unfortunately a very high level of unemployment in the area within our block.There are many long term unemployed often with little or no future prospect of employment { {As many as one in four are unemployed {in the Cynon valley at the present {time.}
There will of course be a further rise in unemployment when the colliery at Penrhiwceiber closes at the end of the year.Men working there at the moment will have the choice of transferring to{Taff Vale Colliery.}However it does mean little or no jobs for future school leavers.It will probably affect firms and small industries which are dependant on the colliery, making things even worse.
